snippet.title: Soulstice: Developers Break Down the First Exclusive Gameplay | gamescom 2021
snippet.description:
Soulstice is a brand new hack "n" slash adventure where a superhuman battles through a grim world alongside her sister, who just so happens to be a ghost. IGN got a sneak peak at the first ever exclusive gameplay, and got a full breakdown on what to expect when playing Soulstice by the game's director Fabio Pagetti and Samuele Perseo.

Thanks for checking out gamescom 2021 on IGN. Be sure to visit IGN from August 25th through August 27th for the daily gamescom 2021 stream to check out shows like gamescom Opening Night Live, gamescom Awesome Indies, and gamescom Best of show. And for gamescom 2021 highlights, IGN will have them all. Throughout gamescom2021,  we’ll be dropping new gamescom announcements, gamescom reveals, and gamescom trailers you don’t want to miss.

#IGN #gamescom2021
